name: Bear On The Run Simulator
description:
Bear strong. Bear very strong. Bear vs Train - see who wins.

Control the 3D bear as he enters the train station. The train comes down the track every 30 seconds, so watch out! Dont worry though, the Bear is stronger than the train.

You've tried the Goat Simulator, now its time for the Bear. Super Fun 3D Bear interactions.

Plenty of fun objects to interact with. Deer, cows, school girls, people waiting for the train - and some bonus surprise objects!

Go for the high score. Enjoy the bear. Send us your suggestions.
